loginPage.title: RI A VHONA HAFHU!
loginPage.subtitle: Ri humbela uri vha ṋee zwidodombedzwa zwavho u dzhena.
loginPage.errorTokenMissing: Vho dzhena zwavhuḓi, fhedzi a hu na thokheni yo ṱanganedzwaho. Ri humbela vha kwamane na thikhedzo.
loginPage.errorDefault: U dzhena ho kundelwa. Ri humbela vha sedze zwidodombedzwa zwavho.
loginPage.errorUnexpectedFormat: Vhukhakhi ha u dzhena (tshiimo {{status}}). Tshivhumbeo tsha vhukhakhi tsho sa lavhelelwaho.
loginPage.errorWithStatus: U dzhena ho kundelwa (tshiimo {{status}}). Ri humbela vha lingedze hafhu.
loginPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Ho vha na vhukhakhi ha nethiweke vhu sa ḓivhei. Ri humbela vha lingedze hafhu.

registrationPage.title: THOMANI ZWINO
registrationPage.subtitle: Sikani akhauthu yanu ya Marito.
registrationPage.firstNamePlaceholder: Ṅwalani dzina ḽanu ḽa u thoma
registrationPage.errorAgreeToTerms: Ni fanela u tenda kha milayo na nyimele.
registrationPage.alertSuccess: Ṅwalisiso yo bvelela! Ri humbela ni ye kha u dzhena.
registrationPage.errorDefault: Ṅwalisiso yo kundelwa. Ri humbela ni lingedze hafhu.
registrationPage.errorWithStatus: Ṅwalisiso yo kundelwa (tshiimo {{status}}). Ri humbela ni lingedze hafhu.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Ho vha na vhukhakhi ha nethiweke vhu sa ḓivhei. Ri humbela ni lingedze hafhu.

glossaryPage.title: Mutevhemaipfi wa Nyambo Nnzhi
glossaryPage.subtitle: Sedzulusa khethekanyo, ṱoḓisisa maipfi, wane ṱhalutshedzo

glossaryPage.selectTerm: Nanga ipfi u vhone zwidodombedzwa na ṱhalutshedzo
glossaryPage.noTermsFound: A hu na maipfi o wanalaho a fanaho na "{{query}}" kha {{category}}.
glossaryPage.noTermsInCategory: A hu na maipfi a wanalaho kha {{category}}.

errors.noToken: A hu na tokheni ya u swikela yo wanwaho. Ri humbela uri ni kone u dzhenela u thoma.
errors.loadFailed: Zwo kondaho u bika datha ya phuroifaile
errors.invalidImage: Ri humbela uri ni nange faela ya tshifanyiso tshi shumaho
errors.fileTooLarge: Saizi ya faela i tea u vha fhasi ha 5MB
errors.uploadError: Zwo kondaho u mpfuxetsha tshifanyiso tsha phuroifaile: {{message}}
errors.nameRequired: Dzina ḽa u thoma na ḽa u fhela zwo ḓifhiwa
errors.emailInvalid: Ri humbela uri ni dzhenise adirese ya imeili i shumaho
